name: CommuniTraders
overview:
CommuniTraders - Trade, Share and Follow the PROS at BinaryOptionsThatSuck.com Social Trading Platform

BinaryOptionsThatSuck.com is the most reliable source for Binary Options Brokers Reviews, Trading Education and the largest Binary Options trader’s community. Our Main Goal is to provide a safe trading and learning environment for all binary traders, beginners to experts. Thanks to our dedicated stuff and fellow traders, BOTS has become the second home for binary options traders.

CommuniTraders Social Trading Platform is our latest achievement – Binary Options Social Trading Platform, Free of Charge. We believe that the wisdom of the crowd is the key to successful trading; Thanks to CT Platform, traders from all over the world could trade binary options, learn from each other, share live trading information, or follow our PROS Signals to success.

CommuniTraders is a 100% online, trading platform that enables you to trade straight from your browser. The CT offers convenient and user friendly trading platform, with the same trading features all brokers have. CommuniTraders advantage over the others is in the sharing and community features which enebles traders to communicate with each other, share insights, tips or follow our PROS.
